data.message: how to unblock someone because i block him by accident (mistake) and i can't find him again !!!

replies.message: Hey Anastasia. To learn how to unblock someone, please visit our Help Center at: https://www.facebook.com/help/115916435160582. It's possible that the person you're looking for may have restricted their privacy settings or blocked you. Sometimes people forget that they've restricted their settings. If you still can't find one of your friends after you've unblocked them, ask them to take a look at their privacy settings. Hope this helps! -Hailey
You're very welcome, Anastasia! Glad I could help. -Hailey
